teal.render

Interface HasRotation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TNode3D, TRendered, TShapeNode, TTransformGroup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccelerationVector, AmpereanCircleNode3D, AmpereanRectangleNode3D, ArrayNode, Arrow, ArrowNode, ArrowWallNode, Ball, BoxNode, Circuit, Coil, ComponentForceVector, ConductingSphericalShell, ConstantField, CurrentSlab, CurrentSlabNode3D, CylindricalMagnet, Dipole, ElectricDipole, ElectricDipoleNode3D, EMObject, EMRadiator, EnergyParticle, EngineRendered, FieldConvolution, FieldDirectionGrid, FieldLine, FieldLineNode, FieldValue, FieldVector, FiniteWire, FiniteWireNode, FluxFieldLine, ForceVector, Fret, GeneralVector, GridNode, Helix, HelixNode, HollowCurrentShell, ImageNode, InclinedPlane, InclinedPlaneNode, InfiniteConductingPlane, InfiniteLineCharge, InfiniteWire, Line, LineChargeNode, LineMagneticDipole, LineNode, MagDipoleNode3D, MagneticDipole, MoveGizmo, MoveNode, MultiShapeNode, Node3D, Particle, PhysicalObject, PointCharge, PointChargeConductingSphere, RadiationFieldLine, RectangleNode, RelativeFLine, Rendered, RigidBar, RingOfCurrent, Seafloor, Seafloor.EdgeNode, Seafloor.StripeNode, ShapeNode, SimRendered, SlidingBox, SolidArrowNode, Spatial, SpatialField, SpatialPhysicalObject, SpatialTextLabel, SpatialVector, SpatialVisualization, Sphere, SphereNode, Stem, StemNode, TeachSpinBase.TellFlux, TextLabelNode, TrailVisualization, TransformGizmo, VelocityVector, Wall, WallNode, WeightedPendulumNode, WeightedPhysicalPendulum, WireNode

    public interface HasRotation
    Objects that may be rotated should implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.vecmath.Quat4d getRotation()
      Returns this object's rotation as a Quat4d.
      boolean isRotable() 
      boolean isRotating() 
      void setRotable(boolean b)
      Sets whether this object should be allowed to rotate (if false, the object will not respond to rotation behaviors).
      void setRotating(boolean state) 
      void setRotation(javax.vecmath.Matrix3d rot)
      Sets this object's rotation as a Matrix3d (rotation matrix).
      void setRotation(javax.vecmath.Quat4d orientation)
      Sets this object's rotation as a Quat4d.

    • Method Detail

      • setRotating

      • isRotating

        boolean isRotating()

      • setRotation

        void setRotation(javax.vecmath.Matrix3d rot)
        Sets this object's rotation as a Matrix3d (rotation matrix). The value is converted to a Quat4d internally.
        Parameters:
        rot - new rotation as Matrix3d.

      • setRotation

        void setRotation(javax.vecmath.Quat4d orientation)
        Sets this object's rotation as a Quat4d.
        Parameters:
        orientation - new rotation as Quat4d.

      • getRotation

        javax.vecmath.Quat4d getRotation()
        Returns this object's rotation as a Quat4d.
        Returns:
        rotation as Quat4d.

        boolean isRotable()
